name: Legend of the Silver Fox
description: Elenor loved the stories her father used to tell her. Especially the one about the Silver Fox. However, this was not a story. She knew it was true; the mysterious animal existed! In order to prove that her father was right all along she searches the Silver Fox herself. Together with her best friend, Jack who lives at the dairy, she keeps exploring the forest. One day, however, she meets another mysterious boy in the woods â€¦
